text: salamdeul-i geudeul-ege malhagil “sillo geudaedeullo inhae salamdeul-i moyeossso, geuleoni geudeul-eul dulyeowohasio.” geulihayeo igeos(salamdeul-ui mal)i geudeul-ui mid-eum-eul jeung-gasikyeossgo geudeul-i malhagil “ulineun hananimman-eulo chungbunhamyeo geubunkkeseoneun cham-eulo hullyunghan uitag-ui daesang-isibnida.”
